poderInterpolate module¶

Interpolate the positional data to match the required gantry positions.

Created on Sun Oct 3 16:27:47 2021

@author: 56153805

poderInterpolate.interpolate(df)¶

Interpolate using chosen method.

Applies changes to the passed df.

Parameters

df (Pandas Dataframe) – Dataframe with positional data.

Returns

Return type

none.

poderInterpolate.main()¶

Suppress execution on import.

Returns

Return type

None.

poderInterpolate.remove_outliers(df)¶

remove ouliers using z-score method.

Parameters

df (TYPE) – DESCRIPTION.

Returns

Return type

None.
